column1: On December 16 2020 a number of state Attorneys General filed an antitrust complaint in the U.S. District
Court for the Eastern District of Texas alleging that Google violated U.S. antitrust laws as well as state
deceptive trade laws relating to its advertising technology.
column2: Additionally on January 24 2023 the DOJ along
